title: Spikies
description: "We're not asking you to leave a bag full of explosives on a crowded train. Every user gets a dirty bomb sooner or later - we're just expediting the process."And so begins a young man's descent into a mouth of madness where lethal drugs become a means to control young revellers and brainwashing is simply an occupational hazard.On the verge of his thirties, disgruntled croupier and shitty boyfriend, Elijah Caulfield. becomes entwined in a police procedure that is determined to bring the local drug supply to it knees. But their methods and their motive may not be as pure as they seem, and when the daughter of a crime boss becomes a casualty of their actions, both Elijah and his superiors must deal with the bloody consequences.Yes, drugs are bad, but things are about to spiral and get a whole lot worse.
author: Christopher Leunig
